00001 #include <epi.h>
00002 
00003 #define EPI_MAP_LINEAR 1
00004 
00005 /*
00006  * epi.c -- defines the 4 simulation engine void * functions required for
00007  *              execution of the model.  Contains the main function.
00008  */
00009 
00010 #define TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS 86400
00011 
00012 /*
00013  * epi_init - initialize node LPs state variables
00014  * 
00015  * state        - our node LP state space
00016  * lp           - our node LP
00017  */
00018 void
00019 epi_init(epi_state * state, tw_lp * lp)
00020 {
00021         epi_agent       *a = pq_top(state->pq);
00022 
00023         if(!a)
00024                 return;
00025 
00026         // agents will not have a remove time of zero.
00027         // set timer for minimum of ts_remove and ts_stage_tran with
00028         // appropriate event type.  EPI_STAGE_TRANSITION has priority.
00029         if (a->ts_stage_tran <= a->ts_remove)
00030                 a->ts_next = a->ts_stage_tran;
00031 
00032         epi_location_timer(state, lp);
00033 }
00034 
00035 /*
00036  * epi_event_handler - main event processing (per node LP)
00037  * 
00038  * state        - our node LP state space
00039  * bf           - a bitfield provided by the simulation ecxecutive
00040  * m            - the incoming event or message
00041  * lp           - our node LP
00042  */
00043 void
00044 epi_event_handler(epi_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00045 {
00046         tw_stime         delta_time;
00047 
00048         int              today;
00049 
00050         // TO DO: need to check for last day to get last day of statistics
00051         today = (int) (tw_now(lp) / TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS);
00052         if(today > g_epi_day)
00053         {
00054                 // report yesterday's statistics
00055                 epi_report_census_tract(); 
00056                 g_epi_day++;
00057 
00058                 // send message to do repport check in num
00059                 //epi_num_check_report(state, lp);
00060 
00061                 // check for report day
00062                 if (g_epi_nreport_days > 0)
00063                         if (today > g_epi_report_days[g_epi_next_report_day])
00064                                 if (g_epi_nreport_days > g_epi_next_report_day+1)
00065                                         g_epi_next_report_day++;
00066         }
00067 
00068         delta_time = tw_now(lp) - state->last_event;
00069 
00070         if(g_epi_complete)
00071                 return;
00072 
00073         if(lp->pe->cur_event->memory)
00074         {
00075                 epi_agent       *a = (epi_agent *) tw_event_memory_get(lp);
00076 
00077                 // compute SEIR for existing, then add agent to LP
00078                 // skip seir if no time has passed
00079                 if ( (state->ncontagious > 0) && (EPSILON < delta_time) )
00080                         epi_seir_compute(state, bf, lp);
00081 
00082                 epi_agent_add(state, bf, a, lp);
00083                 epi_num_add(state, bf, a, lp);
00084                 epi_location_timer(state, lp);
00085         } else
00086         {
00087                 // compute SEIR for all, then remove agent from LP
00088                 // skip seir if no time has passed
00089                 if((state->ncontagious > 0) && (EPSILON < delta_time))
00090                         epi_seir_compute(state, bf, lp);
00091 
00092                 epi_agent_remove(state, bf, lp);
00093                 epi_location_timer(state, lp);
00094         }
00095 
00096         state->last_event = tw_now(lp);
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*
00100  * epi_rc_event_handler - reverse compute effects of out-of-order events
00101  *                        + rollback LP random number generators
00102  *                        + restore LP state variables
00103  * 
00104  * state        - our node LP state space

00108  */
00109 void
00110 epi_rc_event_handler(epi_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00111 {
00112 }
00113 
00114 /*
00115  * epi_final - finalize node LP statistics / outputting
00116  * 
00117  * state        - our node LP state space
00118  * lp           - our node LP
00119  */
00120 void
00121 epi_final(epi_state * state, tw_lp * lp)
00122 {
00123         if(g_epi_day)
00124         {
00125                 epi_report_census_tract(); 
00126                 g_epi_day = 0;
00127         }
00128 
00129         //g_epi_stats->s_move_ev += state->stats->s_move_ev;
00130         //g_epi_stats->s_nchecked += state->stats->s_nchecked;
00131         //g_epi_stats->s_ndraws += state->stats->s_ndraws;
00132         g_epi_stats->s_ninfected += state->stats->s_ninfected;
00133         g_epi_stats->s_ndead += state->stats->s_ndead;
00134 }
